co.cask.coopr.store.provisioner
Interface ProvisionerStore

All Superinterfaces:
com.google.common.util.concurrent.Service
All Known Implementing Classes:
SQLProvisionerStore
public interface ProvisionerStore
extends com.google.common.util.concurrent.Service

Persistent store for provisioner related information, such as capacity used.

Nested Class Summary
 
Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.google.common.util.concurrent.Service

getTimedOutProvisioners

Collection<Provisioner> getTimedOutProvisioners(long idleTimestamp)
                                                throws IOException
Get all provisioners that have not sent a heartbeat since the given timestamp in milliseconds.

Parameters:
idleTimestamp - Timestamp to use as a cutoff. Provisioners that have not sent a heartbeat since this timestamp are returned
Returns:

IOException
